content: do you hoard beautiful one of a kind hand dyed skeins of soft sock weight yarn i do too this is the perfect design to use up all of your crazy colourful yarns remnants bits and bobs leftover yarns and all of your prized special skeins too ideal project for hedgehog fibres sock club yarns past and present simple in construction this wrap lets your yarns shine and your mind rest it s a very easy enjoyable knit with a great knitting rhythm easily adaptable in terms of length width and colours try using yarns that are of similar weight for best results i have used hedgehog fibres sock yarn with one accent yarn for texture interest - hedgehog fibres kidsilk lace you might need to go up 0 5mm needle size to compensate for the kidsilk being thinner the cream-gold-charcoal version is about 50cm wide and 160cm long the scrappy version is a bit longer at 200cm
